Job Title: Division Controller

Location: Fremont, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
JOB DESCRIPTION *Sanmina Corporation (Nasdaq: SANM) is a leading integrated manufacturing solutions provider serving the fastest-growing segments of the global Electronics Manufacturing Services (EMS) market and related Components such as Machining, Metal Fabrication, Plastics, Cables, Printed Circuit Boards, and others. Recognized as a technology leader, Sanmina Corporation provides end-to-end manufacturing solutions, delivering superior quality and support to Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) primarily in the communications networks, defense and aerospace, industrial and semiconductor systems, medical, multimedia, computing and storage, automotive and clean technology sectors. Sanmina Corporation has facilities strategically located in key regions throughout the world.Fabrication Division ControllerJob Purpose:The Fabrication Division Controller will be responsible for all financial aspects of regional operations including financial forecasting, planning, budgeting, and financial control systems. Additionally, the Division Controller will work closely with the Manufacturing Operations Leaders to assist in all aspects of the business, including, but not limited to, Operations efficiency, costs, process improvement, internal control development and compliance, sophisticated financial analysis, project specific analysis and general business partnership. Nature of Duties/ResponsibilitiesDevelops and directs the activities of professional staff involving the financial aspects of regional operations including financial forecasting, planning, budgeting, credit and collections, cost accounting, and financial control systems.Manages and directs staff to conduct all routine procedures and duties associated with the regional controller organization.Provides advice and counsel to regional operating management to ensure the optimum performance of the region.Interprets financial data collection to influence, recommend, or impel management toward logical decisions consistent with company objectives.Set up and monitor systems of internal control consistent with direction provided by the Group Controller and Manager of Tax & Treasury.Monitors regional credits and collections.Prepares financial projections and company status reports to regional and corporate management as required and coordinates discussions with corporate management on financial matters.Identifies and implements programs that control the corporation’s financial risk, including implementation of programs established by the Group Controller and Manager of Tax & Treasury.Develops and implements systems to control the manufacturing operation costs and maintain systems to monitor product lines and customer profitability. Education and Experience:BA or equivalent plus 10 or more years of related experienceManufacturing environment industry experience is strongly desired.Must possess analytical, organizational planning, communication, budgeting and forecasting ability and the ability to work independently in a changing environmentInternational experience is required or would be a definite assetSpecific experience in the Contract Metal Fabrication, Machining, or other component level manufacturing industriesExperience working in a fast paced and dynamic manufacturing environmentStrong presentation/interpersonal skills & ability to deal at an Executive levelConfident and 'hands on' personality with strong problem solving and issue management skills.Experience with fully integrated manufacturing and financial IT systems (Oracle experience preferred )CPA or CMA preferred This is an ITAR facility and applicant must be a US Citizen or a lawful permanent resident. Sanmina is an Equal Opportunity Employer – M/F/Veteran/Disability/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity Salary Range (annual): $160,000 -$200,000In addition, Sanmina Provides a variety of benefits including health insurance coverage, life and disability insurance, savings plan, Company paid holidays and paid time off (PTO) for vacation and/or personal businessSanmina is an Equal Opportunity Employer – M/F/Veteran/Disability/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
